location: Mytilene. A street before the brothel.

lines.text: Enter, from the brothel, two Gentlemen

lines.speaker: first gentleman
lines.text: Did you ever hear the like?

lines.speaker: second gentleman
lines.text: No, nor never shall do in such a place as this, she being once gone.

lines.speaker: first gentleman
lines.text: But to have divinity preached there! did you ever dream of such a thing?

lines.speaker: second gentleman
lines.text: No, no. Come, I am for no more bawdy-houses: shall's go hear the vestals sing?

lines.speaker: first gentleman
lines.text: I'll do any thing now that is virtuous; but I am out of the road of rutting for ever.
